subject: Re: New here!
author: Staten Island Paranormal
full_text:
Well, last night we listened to some of them on the video tape.  Some 
we can make out very easily and some are harder to hear.  Chris Moon 
has a lot of experience with it, so it's a little easier for him to 
interpret sometimes.  Someone else has the audio recordings and she's 
going through them.

I'm curious too!  :)


--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, LON3_S7AR <lon3_s7ar@...> wrote:
>
> interesting
>   have you listened to the messages again?
>   since you heard them the first time?
>   curious to know what happens!
>   amy in san antone
>
